Avocet Sales & marketing

Supplying Northern California and Nevada with high end components, automation, and test equipment from around the world

request a quote

Custom Sourcing Solutions for Engineered Parts and Automation Systems

Avocet Sales and Marketing has been providing Manufacturing Design Assistance and Comprehensive Sourcing Solutions for Mechanical Engineered Component Parts and automation systems for over 20 years. We work to save you time and money by optimizing designs for manufacturability and facilitating the sourcing process.
